attributes.title: terrible!!! total scam!
attributes.review: i love trump, and china, and they both love me. but right after downloading this app it encrypted my phone with a virus firewall bug!! not good or cool donald, i am speechless :( now i need a new phone AND social security number!!! I'M MAD

attributes.title: Disappointment
attributes.review: I had high hopes when downloaded the app. It keeps crashing ...so annoying!! Someone needs to make this app great just like our boy.

attributes.title: 17+ for a reason...
attributes.review: The app supports and shows many inappropriate things and people....when I first opened it I cried for 30 minutes because a giant Cheeto was staring at me! Very unsettling 0/10

attributes.title: Propaganda App
attributes.review: I went on this app only to find it was mostly propaganda. Do not recommend. There are much better information sources out there than this misleading app.

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: Trump 2020! What a great and awesome president!! This app will do great things for you! Y’all stay blessed🙏🏼💞✨

attributes.title: Completely horrible
attributes.review: This is the absolute worst app I have every used in my life. I hope that no one else ever has to deal with this horrible app

attributes.title: oh em gee
attributes.review:
i downloaded it and then my toilet went “BOOM”. the next day i woke up and my laptop had a glitch and it said all- 🤢all live- 🤢 “all lives matter” 🤮🤮. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: I don’t this app is not really good it’s glitches so I all I see is an orange on it it scared I thought I downloaded a horror app im not gonna be able to sleep tonight thank you for you time

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app took days to download, doesn’t even look professional and gave me the most irrelevant information.

attributes.title: This app is trash😀
attributes.review: The first think I see is this hideous monster then after that the app had the audacity to ask for my phone number.
